CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Override_Origination_Fee__c), IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Deal__r.LOC_Loan_Type__c , 'Credit Line')), Deal__r.CAF_Upfront_Fee__c * ( Max_Initial_Loan_Amount_Input__c + Approved_Renovation_Holdback__c ) , 0), Override_Origination_Fee__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: % of the Maximum Amount to be funded for this Property
CustomField.label: Origination Fee $
